subject: Horse Racing
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Mine That Bird earned an unscheduled workout at Churchill Downs after his trainer, Chip Woolley, decided the small bay gelding needed to burn some energy.
